title: "Robots are everywhere – improving how they communicate with people could advance human-robot collaboration"
excerpt: "Robots are machines that can sense the environment and use that information to perform an action. You can find them nearly everywhere in industrialized societies today. There are household robots that vacuum floors and warehouse robots that pack and ship goods."
